<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coro/switchcloner"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coro/switchcloner/#ac1a0f607ea14257093cd8eaeb09f0ddc">SwitchCloner</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/coro/basecloner/#ae598844a9d1a8837d0d222b44935d697">BaseCloner</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
